divs: sighting detailsjune\20\2007 1:58pm>i live in the bronx n.y. watching planes fly overhead from local l>g>a (la guardia airport) new york city with binocculars is a pastime\hobby >this particular afternoon a u.s.air jet passed overhead > no big deal !until a bell\diamond shape ''object '' crosses my view while watching the plane. i quickly focused on the ''object'',it stopped , hover with a shimmer of light on one side , for maybe 10 sec.,(no sound ,moving parts,or exaust) then headed north (from here n. is toward conn.)lost sight after house blocked my view ,ran to the front of the house for a bettter\2nd look ,but disappearred! now that i have seen for myself (2 previous times @ night)& now in broad daylite ,80d\sunny > i am investing in infrared\night vision tech. to catch one on tape! p.s.> i am your avg. guy -this is wierd! 41yrs.old never seen an aircraft like this b\4..ever!!!!!
